---
title: Borg Rate of Perceived Exertion (Borg RPE)
---


The Borg RPE scale ranges from 6-20 and can be used to estimate current HR: @eq-borg-hr

$$
\textrm{Estimated Current HR} = \textrm{Borg RPE} \times 10
$$ {#eq-borg-hr}

::: {#tbl-borg-rpe-scale}
